title: T206 for trade only for Larry Doyle
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: T206 for trade only for Larry Doyle
posts.post_content:
Mainly looking for With Bat even more specifically Piedmont 350-460 factory 25 and Sweet Caporal 350-460 factory 42
But am open to any back of that pose and tougher ones for his throwing pose and portrait

Email at [url]maxjcards@gmail.com[/url] or PM 

Not really looking to move these for anything else at the moment 

[IMG]https://i.imgur.com/eTw6Kqq.jpg?1[/IMG]
Turner and Criger are gone. Still looking to trade!
